channel.title: brain-metabolic-system on Jun-Liszt Li
channel.description: Recent content in brain-metabolic-system on Jun-Liszt Li

item.title: Research
item.description: Brain vasculature system Our goal is to understand the principles underlying the formation of the brain vasculature system. Brain endothelial cells are one of the major components of brain vasculature system and involved in many kinds of brain vasculature disease, like AVM, CCM, HHT. Brain metabolic system Metabolism is physiologically fundamental to a biological system. Understanding brain metabolism is critical for our comprehensive knowledge of brain function in health and disease.
